message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can we meet in the middle at $9,500?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is significantly below my bottom line.  Let's meet closer to the middle. How about $10,250?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit shy of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800, which is a fair price considering the product's value to me. Can we meet at $9,800?
